duties_responsibilities.duty: Support GIS workload and ensure productivity goals are met
Maintain a collaborative work environment between project managers and GIS specialists
Use Esri ArcGIS Desktop/ArcGIS Pro for editing data, analysis, and map-making
Data management and support for tablets and GPS units using Field Maps and Survey 123
Develop Web Maps/Apps/Dashboards for use on ArcGIS Online and Portal
Create complex final map products using ArcGIS Pro
Design, create, maintain, and QA/QC geospatial databases using ArcGIS Pro, Smartsheets, or ArcGIS Enterprise
Build tools and script programs to automate deliverables and integrate spatial data with other applications
Create documentation on processes and present GIS-related subject matter to groups

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Geography, Cartography, Archaeology, Biology, or Environmental Science with an emphasis in GIS (Master’s degree a plus)
